movies.title: Somebody Help Me
movies.plot: The screenplay centers on characters Brendan Young and Darryl Jennings who take a trip to the Lake Arrowhead with a group of college friends to celebrate Young's girlfriend's birthday. One-by-one the coeds begin disappearing until a mysterious young visitor arrives and helps them begin to unravel their tangled web of terror.
movies.simplePlot: The screenplay centers on characters Brendan Young and Darryl Jennings who take a trip to the Lake Arrowhead with a group of college friends to celebrate Young's girlfriend's birthday. ...

biography.bio: Graduated from UNC-CH with a BSBA; did post graduate work at NCSU; became a Real Estate Investor/Broker; moved into the film making business full-time following move to Wilmington, North Carolina in 1999. Ran a production company, doing over 70 shows; ranging from features, to commercials, and two national cable TV shows. Moved to LA in 2007 to be a full time Actor/Producer. Owns LaGrip, LaRedCarpets, and LaGripProductions.com doing 300+ shows every year. As a full time SAG-AFTRA actor you can see Braxton on Showtime, BET, HBO, and upcoming feature films!
biography.name: Braxton Davis

biography.bio: Is a New Orleans native. Her family's history in the city has been traced back as far as the 1800s. Her father was one of the first African American geologists at Texaco oil and her mother was a nurse for over 30 years throughout the metropolitan city. She graduated from George Mason University with a BA in theater.
biography.name: Donna Duplantier

biography.bio: Amanda Fetters is an actress, known for The Lucky One (2012), Somebody Help Me (2007) and The Last Low Tide (2009).
biography.name: Amanda Fetters

biography.bio: Alexis Fields is an American actress who has appeared in shows and movies such as Roc (1994), Kenan and Kel (1996-2000), Sister, Sister (1994-1999), Moesha (1996-2001), Jacked (2001), Hangin with Mr. Copper (1992-1997), The Parent Hood (1995-1999), and Somebody Help me in 2007. Her acting career started in 1993, She was born March 1, 1982 in California, she is known to be the daughter of Chip Fields who appeared in Good Times as penny's abusive mother, in 1977, Her sister is Famous actress Kim Fields, who played Tootie in Facts Of Life (1979-1988) and Regine Hunter in Living Single. (1993-1998)
biography.name: Alexis Fields

biography.placeOfBirth: Studio City, Los Angeles, California, USA
biography.bio: Jessica Friedman was born on October 22, 1977 in Studio City, Los Angeles, California, USA. She is an actress, known for Entourage (2004), Somebody Help Me (2007) and The O.C. (2003).
biography.name: Jessica Friedman

biography.bio: Luke Frydenger is an actor and director, known for The Girl in the Dark (2012), Haute Wheels (2013) and Inspiration Nation (2013).
biography.name: Luke Frydenger

biography.bio: Omari Ishmael Grandberry was born on 12th November 1984 in California, Los Angeles. He is the older brother of singer O'Ryan. He and his former band-mates Lil Fizz, Raz-B and J-Boog were discovered by manager and director Christopher B. Stokes. They formed a band called B2K. B2K stands for Boys of the New Millennium. They were formed at the ages of between 15 - 16 years old. Omari was brought up in Inglewood by his mother. He was the oldest of the members of B2K. He was the lead singer. The band disbanded in January 2004 after appearing in the film You Got Served, Omarion then went solo and has a solo LP entitled "O" which was released in February 22nd 2005 through Epic Records.
biography.name: Omarion Grandberry

biography.bio: Marques Houston was born on August 4, 1981 in Los Angeles, California, USA as Marques Barrett Houston. He is an actor, known for Sister, Sister (1994), You Got Served (2004) and Fat Albert (2004).
biography.name: Marques Houston

biography.bio: Christopher Jones was born on February 4, 1982 in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, USA as Christopher Michael Jones. He is known for his work on Forrest Gump (1994), You Got Served (2004) and Big Momma's House 2 (2006).
biography.name: Christopher Jones

biography.bio: Sonny was born in Washington D.C. to Betty L. King. He attended Fort Hill High School in Cumberland Maryland and continued to perform in plays and played keyboard in a local "cover" band. After high school and a short stint as a drama major at the University Of Maryland, Sonny joined the Navy before the Marines and Army came calling with the draft. Vietnam was raging and Sonny spent a year aboard the aircraft carrier U.S.S.Ranger. He came to L.A. 1981, family in tow, and has made his living as an electrician, actor and musician until the present.
biography.name: Sonny King

biography.bio: Garrison Koch was born the Son of Jack and Christine Koch in Burbank, California. Liking movies ever since he was child, he didn't know that he even wanted to be an actor until he started doing it. "I never thought I could even be an actor until a friend took me to my first acting class in San Francisco." The classes paid off and from there he was casted in his first acting gig, for Don Johnsons "Nash Bridges" that was filmed right there in San Francisco. Knowing that if he was really serious about acting, he had to move to Los Angeles. After his first audition with writer/director Mark Schwab, he landed the part of Lance in Pins and Needles. The film was accepted in the NY International independent Film festival for which Garrison won Best Supporting Actor in a Feature Film. Garrison has landed parts in The O.C., Girlfriends, Cutting Room (two time award winner in the Milan Film Festival '06), and Somebody Help Me, Directed by Chris Stokes and co-starring with Omarion and Marques Houston, which premiered at the historic Grauman's Chinese Theatre this past October.
biography.name: Garrison Koch

biography.bio: Brittany Oaks was born on October 8, 1993 as Brittany Dawn Oaks. She is an actress, known for Red Eye (2005), The Cat in the Hat (2003) and A Time for Dancing (2002).
biography.name: Brittany Oaks

biography.bio: Stephen Snedden was born on July 1, 1971 in Tulsa, Oklahoma, USA as Stephen Francis Snedden. He is an actor, known for Antwone Fisher (2002), The lone gunmen - Au coeur du complot (2001) and Three Days in August (2016). He has been married to Hannah Halliwell since March 19, 2006. They have four children.
biography.name: Stephen Snedden

biography.bio: Irene Stokes is known for her work on You Got Served (2004), Caged Heat (1974) and Somebody Help Me 2 (2010).
biography.name: Irene Stokes

biography.bio: Brooklyn Sudano was born on January 5, 1981 in Los Angeles, California, USA. She is an actress, known for With This Ring (2015), My Wife and Kids (2001) and Rain (2006). She has been married to Mike McGlaflin since October 8, 2006.
biography.name: Brooklyn Sudano
